Text: Cannot get it to run on a MacPro running 10.6 server.
doesn't work, just get the demo; it's cool ;)
Doesn't launch at all on my early 2008 macbook pro, running snow leopard. The demo from the cathode website works.

Here's how to get it working!

Move Cathode.app to /Applications

Then, in terminal:

$ chmod -R 777 /Applications/Cathode.app/*
$ chmod +x /Applications/Cathode.app/*

And it should run.
